root.Title: Registration completion page is opened by clicking [Got a question?] menu section [Product]->[CFD Trading].
root.Steps: <1>Navigate to capital.com</1> <2>Click button [Burger menu]</2> <3>Click menu section [Products]</3> <4>Click menu item [CFD trading]</4> <5>Click button [Got a question?] in block 'With Capital.com help is always at hand.'</5>
root.Actual_Result: Registration completion page is opened / The trading platform page is opened (depends on role).
